Detailed Description

Packet containing information about the smallest routing costs from one map to another.

Packet contains (X is REPLY_HEADER_SIZE):
PosSizeComment
X 4 bytes Number of map pairs with routing costs.
X + 4 4 bytes The user defined data.
X + 8 4 bytes The map pairs with routing costs.
